c74object.name: rdcblock~
c74object.digest: DC blocking filter with sample accurate reset
c74object.description: rdcblock~ is a simple dc blocking filter in which the filter memory can be reset on a sample-accurate basis, using a dedicated reset input. The original use was for use in granular applications where the DC varies according to the grain parameters. rdcblock~ is heavily based on dcblock~ from the PeRColate objects by Dan Trueman and R. Luke DuBois. (http://www.music.columbia.edu/PeRColate/).

entry.name: signal
entry.description: Outputs a DC blocked audio signal.
